Title: Stored Procedure Pager
Description: Stored Procedure Pager is an open source asp.net/mvc user pager control.The most important feature is support for Stored Procedure.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Stored Procedure Pager is an open source asp.net/mvc user pager control.The most important feature is support for Stored Procedure.

the appearance of application like this:

Main feature

1 Client can use custom stored procedure or the default stored procedure named ".LYBPager".
2 Support jquery ajax and general html.
3 Support asp.net MVC 3.0 OR later
